verses.name: Ezekiel 34:29
verses.text: And I will raise up for them a plant of renown, and they shall be no more consumed with hunger in the land, neither bear the shame of the heathen any more.

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:30
verses.text: Thus shall they know that I the Lord their God am with them, and that they, even the house of Israel, are my people, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 34:31
verses.text: And ye my flock, the flock of my pasture, are men, and I am your God, saith the Lord God.
